author: Oliver O'Connell, Oliver O'Connell
title: AOC calls for federal welfare relief for undocumented workers as California tables action in stimulus package
description: Undocumented workers file and pay taxes differently, so are currently ineligible for federal help
content:
California Governor Gavin Newsom is working on an economic stimulus package at the state level aimed at helping immigrants in the country illegally during the coronavirus pandemic.
Undocumented workers are not covered by the federal government stimulus packa… [+2632 chars]
